member.name: T:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert
member.summary: Tests the implementation of IChangableObject. Primarily focused on raising change events.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenAllPropertiesChange``1
member.summary: Tests that when all of the properties of a Type change, the IsChanged property value is set to true once and raises the OnChange event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenAllPropertiesChange``1(``0)
member.summary: Tests that when all of the properties of an object change, the IsChanged property value is set to true once and raises the OnChange event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenEachPropertyChanges``1
member.summary: Tests that when each property on a Type is changed, the IsChanged property value is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenEachPropertyChanges``1(``0)
member.summary: Tests that when each property on an object is changed, the IsChanged property value is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangeForSpecificPropertiesChanged``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Tests that when a list of properties on a Type are changed, the IsChanged property value is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.
member.param: List of property names to change.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangeForSpecificPropertiesChanged``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},``0)
member.summary: Tests that when a list of properties on an object are changed, the IsChanged property value is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.
member.param: List of property names to change.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenSpecificPropertyChanges``1(System.String)
member.summary: Tests that when a property on a Type is changed the IsChanged property value is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenSpecificPropertyChanges``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when a property on an object is changed the IsChanged property value is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedOnAcceptChanges``1
member.summary: Tests that when a Type Accepts Changes the IsChanged property value is set to false once and raises the OnChanged event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedOnAcceptChanges``1(``0)
member.summary: Tests that when an object Accepts Changes the IsChanged property value is set to false once and raises the OnChanged event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenListItemsAdded``1(System.String)
member.summary: Tests that when items are added to a list property on a Type, the IsChanged property is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.
member.param: Property name of the list to add items to.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenListItemsAdded``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when items are added to a list property on an object, the IsChanged property is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.
member.param: Property name of the list to add items to.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenListItemsAdded``1(System.Collections.IList,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when items are added to a list property on an object, the IsChanged property is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenListItemsRemoved``1(System.String)
member.summary: Tests that when items are removed from a list property on a Type, the IsChanged property is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.
member.param: Property name of the list to remove items from.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenListItemsRemoved``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when items are removed from a list property on an object, the IsChanged property is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.
member.param: Property name of the list to remove items from.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenListItemsRemoved``1(System.Collections.IList,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when items are removed from a list property on an object, the IsChanged property is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenListItemsChange``1(System.String)
member.summary: Tests that when items are changed within a list on a Type, the IsChanged property is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.
member.param: Property name of the list to change items from.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenListItemsChange``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when items are changed within a list on an object, the IsChanged property is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.
member.param: Property name of the list to change items from.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangableObjectAssert.NotifiesIsChangedWhenListItemsChange``1(System.Collections.IList,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when items are changed within a list on an object, the IsChanged property is set to true once and raises the OnChanged event once.

member.name: T:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert
member.summary: Tests and checks objects that implement IChangeTracking.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.AcceptsChanges``1
member.summary: Tests that a Type that implements property implements the AcceptChanges() method.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.AcceptsChanges``1(``0)
member.summary: Tests that an object that implements properly implements the AcceptChanges() method.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenAllPropertiesChange``1
member.summary: Tests that a Type's IsChange property is true when all of the properties are changed.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenAllPropertiesChange``1(``0)
member.summary: Tests that an object's IsChange property is true when all of the properties are changed.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenEachPropertyChanges``1
member.summary: Tests that a Type's IsChange property is true when each property changes.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenEachPropertyChanges``1(``0)
member.summary: Tests that an object's IsChange property is true when each property changes.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenSpecificPropertiesChange``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Tests that a Type's IsChanged property is true when a list of properties change.
member.param: List of property names to change.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenSpecificPropertiesChange``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},``0)
member.summary: Tests that an object's IsChanged property is true when a list of properties change.
member.param: List of property names to change.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenSpecificPropertyChanges``1(System.String)
member.summary: Tests that a Type's IsChanged property is true when a named property's value changes.
member.param: Name of the property to change.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenSpecificPropertyChanges``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Tests that an object's IsChanged property is true when a named property's value changes.
member.param: Name of the property to change.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenListItemsAdded``1(System.String)
member.summary: Tests that when multiple items are added to a list, the Type's IsChanged property is true.
member.param: Name of the property that contains the list to test.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenListItemsAdded``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when multiple items are added to a list, the object's IsChanged property is true.
member.param: Name of the property that contains the list to test.
with the property containing a list to test.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenListItemsAdded``1(System.Collections.IList,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when multiple items are added to a list, the object's IsChanged property is true.
member.param: contained within the property to test.
with the property containing a list to test.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenListItemsRemoved``1(System.String)
member.summary: Tests that when all of the items from a list are removed, the Type's IsChanged value is true.
member.param: Name of the property that contains the list to test.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenListItemsRemoved``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when all of the items from a list are removed, the object's IsChanged value is true.
member.param: Name of the property that contains the list to test.
with the property containing a list to test.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenListItemsRemoved``1(System.Collections.IList,``0)
member.summary: Tests that when all of the items from a list are removed, the object's IsChanged value is true.
member.param: contained within the property to test.
with the property containing a list to test.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenListItemsChange``1(System.String)
member.summary: Test that when multiple items in a list change, the Type's IsChange property is true.
member.param: Name of the property that contains the list to test.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.ChangeTrackingAssert.IsChangedWhenListItemsChange``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Test that when multiple items in a list change, the object's IsChange property is true.

with the property containing a list to test.

member.summary: Test that when multiple items in a list change, the object's IsChanged property is true.

with the property containing a list to test.

member.name: T:JSR.TestAsserts.EquivalencyAssert
member.summary: Tests and checks for equivalency.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.EquivalencyAssert.AreEquivalent``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Tests if two objects have the same values for their properties.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.EquivalencyAssert.AreNotEquivalent``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Tests if two objects do not have the same values for their properties.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.EquivalencyAssert.AreListsEquivalent``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Test if two lists have the same values.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.EquivalencyAssert.AreListsNotEquivalent``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Test if two lists do not have the same values.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.EquivalencyAssert.CheckAreEquivalent``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Checks if two values contain the same values.
member.param: containing the expected values to compare to.
member.returns: True if the objects contain the same values for their properties; otherwise false.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.EquivalencyAssert.CheckAreListsEquivalent``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Checks if two lists contain the same values.
member.typeparam: of to check for equal values.
member.param: containing expected values to compare to.
member.returns: True if the lists contain the same values; otherwise false.

member.name: T:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert
member.summary: Tests objects that support property change and property change notification.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert.ChangesValues``1
member.summary: Tests that an object's property values can be changed.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert.ChangesValues``1(``0)
member.summary: Test that an object's property values can be changed.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert.ChangesValues(System.Type)
member.summary: Test that an object's property values can be changed.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert.NotifiesEachPropertyChanges``1
member.summary: Tests that all properties on a Type notify property changes.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert.NotifiesEachPropertyChanges``1(``0)
member.summary: Tests that all properties on an object notify property changes.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert.NotifiesPropertiesChanged``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Tests that specified properties raise the PropertyChanged event for a Type.
member.param: List of properties to test for the PropertyChanged event.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert.NotifiesPropertiesChanged``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},``0)
member.summary: Tests that specified properties raise the PropertyChanged event for an object.
member.param: List of properties to test for the PropertyChanged event.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert.NotifiesPropertyChanged``1(System.String)
member.summary: Tests that a property raises the PropertyChanged event for a Type.
member.param: Name of property to test for the PropertyChanged event.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.PropertyChangeAssert.NotifiesPropertyChanged``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Tests that a property raises the PropertyChanged event for an object.
member.param: Name of property to test for the PropertyChanged event.

member.name: T:JSR.TestAsserts.SerializationAssert
member.summary: Performs Assers on Serialization operations.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.SerializationAssert.SerializesAndDeserializes``1
member.summary: Tests that an object serializes and retains its values when it is deserialized.
member.typeparam: Type of object to test serialization.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.SerializationAssert.SerializesAndDeserializes``1(``0)
member.summary: Tests that an object serializes and retains its values when it is deserialized.
member.typeparam: Type of object to test serialization.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.SerializationAssert.SerializesAndDeserializes(System.Type)
member.summary: Tests that an object serializes and retains its values when it is deserialized.
member.param: Type of object to test deserialization.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.SerializationAssert.IsNotChangedAfterDeserialized``1
member.summary: Tests that an object is not changed after deserialization.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.SerializationAssert.IsNotChangedAfterDeserialized``1(``0)
member.summary: Tests that an object is not changed after deserialization.

member.name: M:JSR.TestAsserts.SerializationAssert.IsNotChangedAfterDeserialized(System.Type)
member.summary: Tests that an object is not changed after deserialization.
member.param: Type of object that implements . If the type specified does not implement and exception will occur.
